entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 3:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
